description: Forgot your alarm clock at home and need a quick replacement? Alarm Clock for Touchpad is a simple and easy to use utility app that can be used for setting alarms for a particular date and time. Snooze functionality to help you sleep a bit longer has also been provided. You can select your favorite wall paper from a list compiled to give you good vibes. You can also select your favorite ringtone from the list of touchpad ringtones.
versionNote: Addition of 7 beautiful wall papers of Lake Pangong in Kashmir valley. Lake Pangong is a very beautiful tourist site.
